name: Fantasy Grounds - Menace in Ravenreach (5E)
detailed_description:
Menace in Ravenreach


When the group of adventurers arrived in the outpost town of Ravenreach they headed directly to the local tavern. As was usual, it took under the hour until fists started flying, glassware shattering and furniture flying. The fighting ended, just as the last of the locals melted away. Their incarceration made the wanderers the ideal candidates for an unusual errand. The Master Minder, the court wizard, requires the capture of a local troll - alive - for his studies. Without hesitation they accepted the task and into the wilds they went. Not exactly start to a Saga of old, but the days are young as they slip into the dark woods.

What to Expect

Menace in Ravenreach by James Thomasis an adventure for mid-level characters.

Inside you will find:

An adventure found while visiting a far away outpost, ruled by the illegitimate son of nobility that has its share of intrigue.
NPCs which are both allies and antagonists.
A swift and dangerous journey requested by a powerful NPC.
New creatures and new magic items.

Converted by: Michael Potter

Released on April 30, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.8 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
